page.title: 12Day In The Life.. Page (2)
page.content: Classes resume at 10.55 am and finish for the morning at 12.15 pm.Roll call brings the community together for the news of the day.Lunch follows until 1.00 pm.A supervised homework period of half an hour or an hour follows and then on Monday and Wednesday an organised games coaching period.All boys are given rugby coaching and some represent the Junior School 1st XV, 2nd XV and Colts XV.Girls do hockey and netball.In the summer Cricket, Athletics and Swimming teams also represent the College. On Tuesday,Thursday and Friday activities like orchestra,opera and Computer club are offered to the students. After tea at 3.00 pm,the pupils return to classes until 5.35 pm.The day pupils' coaches depart at 5.45 and the boarders are free until 6.30 pm.
